question.title: What is a characteristic of activated lymphocytes in mononucleosis syndrome?

option_a.title: Hyperchromatic lymphocytes
option_a.description: Lymphocytes with an abnormal amount of chromatin

option_b.title: Hyperbasophilic lymphocytes
option_b.description: Lymphocytes with an abnormal amount of basophilia

option_c.title: Hyperplastic lymphocytes
option_c.description: Lymphocytes that are overactive and multiply excessively

option_d.title: Hypobasic lymphocytes
option_d.description: Lymphocytes with a decreased amount of basophilia

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The correct answer is a type of lymphocyte that is hyperbasophilic
